>
[Divine Grace](/Feats.aspx?ID=218) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=24" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 110 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Trigger**
You attempt a save against a spell, before you roll.

</column>

---

You call upon your deity’s grace, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus to the save.
